Name: Poly Pirates
About the game: Build ye ship, battle ye enemies, and take the plunder! But beware, there be dangers in these waters... Ye begin yer voyage by designing a ship to battle other ships or other horrors of the sea. Once, ye have yer ship built, ye must survive waves of enemies and collecting their loot until ye have reach ye pirate base, which ye can upgrade ye ship or design a completely new ship. Will ye become the greatest pirate to roam these seas?.... Features: - Custom ship creation - Sea monsters - Ship/crew management - Resource management - Ship combat: both cannon range and boarding action - Loot collection
